All right, I think I can answer most of your complaints.  You still won't 
like it but that's okay because, like you said, you don't post.

First of all Azure has been a moderator, or should have been, for several 
months.

Secondly, he was chosen by UNANIMOUS vote of the three members of the council.

Third, Hugar was removed because he hasn't done anything at all in over two 
months.

Forth, don't blame rAauq, because most of these things were changes I 
suggested, including the Poll rule.

A final Note, contact me or Azure or rAuq PERSONALLY with any further 
comments.

--part1_154.d89d28a.2a086f75_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
